page.title: 15Toys we play with
page.content: The type of toys I play with are 'My Little Ponies' which are ponies with funny names like Peachy, Applejack, Seashell and Cotton Candy. They are rubber, hand sized ponies with long tails and a long mane and they are all different colours. I also like playing tennis with a ball and two tennis rackets. I like playing with dolls and Sindys which are small dolls with lots of clothes to go with them. I have a bike which I ride on a lot. Another type of toy we play with are computer games. Some are logic games where you are given questions to answer, or adventure games where you solve clues to find the answers. There are lots of other computer games like Big Trak. You can make it travel by giving it instructions of left and right, forwards and backwards.
